title: ETEKCITY Digital Bathroom Scale, Weight Scale with Large Blue LCD Backlight, High Precision Measurements, 6mm Tempered Glass, 180kg, Silver, 1 Piece (Pack of 1)
descriptions:
Introducing the ETEKCITY Digital Bathroom Scale: a sleek and reliable weight scale designed to meet your fitness tracking needs. Featuring a large, easy-to-read blue backlit LCD display, this scale provides accurate measurements in both pounds and kilograms. Its advanced design incorporates four high-precision sensors, offering precision down to 30 grams, with a maximum capacity of up to 180 kg (400 lbs).

 Built to last, its sturdy 6 mm tempered glass platform ensures long-term durability. Whether you're closely monitoring your fitness journey or maintaining your weight, this scale is the perfect companion. Note: always inspect the scale before use and avoid using it if there is any damage or cracks. Invest in your health confidently with the ETEKCITY Digital Bathroom Scale.
